Ilorin. 伊洛林(Ilorin) Cing-ci Mttuku balay ka gasoring mi ida nkiya gasu cuweyn Nigeria. Kndadax kngkawas 1970 dhuq saya pa, gasoring cuko ka kndudul wada pusu balay pnyahan keyjay qnlhangan dha. Gasoring cuko ka knkana nngalan dha 98%, kiya ka knkana nngalan qnlhangan na 83%. Mniq kngkawas 2006, bnkuwan patas sngcan congcu kcka qnlhangan Nigeria (kwoci huyryu) dhuq 238,920, tu2 tnbkuwan kana Afrika, msnul bukuy Tuhunac Afrika (408,074). Spuda Ingkoku Keyjay Sweyjn Cuku mi Qnlangan Ginghang ka smpu, GDP Nigeria pa spuda biyax bbari dha smpu u kndadax kngkawas 2005 na 1707 oku pila Amirika dhuq kngkawas 2007 na 2926 oku pila Amirika, wada balay hmrinas mn1 dungan. Kiya mi kngkawas 2014 Nigeria Qnlhangan Pyawcwencyu tongci sweycya Jemikale ka pkla, keyjay tnkawas Nigeria pa wada dhuq 5090 oku pila Amirika da, keyjay knou niya u wada hmrinas Tuhunac Afrika mi wada mtbkuwan qnlangan tu26, wada mknbeyhing bay keyjayti Afrika. Binaw mniq quri so lxanan smluwan mi sskuwan nengweyn u, ini baka Tuhunac Afrika kiya. Mniq 20 th 70 kngkkawas jiday mrana balay ka gasoring cida, Nigeria u alaw lxanan smluwan tocu mi psumu pila kiya ka wada ou balay ka saking dha nganguc. Mniq 80 jiday kcka qnrqilan gasoring u, wada mlih ka knkrayan gasoring, Nigeria u msmay bay muway saking dha nganguc, binaw hiti daw wada scuqi pririh muway pila saking, kiya ka wada psanak muway duma taykang risi uri. Pnsaking pila mi baking risi ka wada mrana mi ini dhqi muway ka pusu pila saking, kndudul mrana balay ka saking dha. Binaw, spuda seyhu Nigeria mi pnsaking qnlhangan ka muda pprngaw kari daw, kngkawas 2005 idas 10 Nigeria mi Paris Cyuropu pnsaking pila u wada mddahur psdhu kari, Nigeria u ya bay dmuwi 60% nhlitan pila snburah mari saking dha dungan. Kiya mi dmuwi nangalan ndhiya nanaq pila gasoring muda muway msngari niya 40%, tnkawas mangal hmrinas 11.5 oku pila Amirika ddiyun quri phlih mqrinuc niya. Nigeria mniq kngkawas 2006 idas 4 pa wada smnlanan rikisi: Dhiya u wada mtu1 pririh kana Paris Cyuropu taykang na qnlhangan Afrika (ya bay niqan 300 oku pila Amirika). Nigeria ka knkana qnlangan tu12 knbeyhing pnyahan gasoring mi tu8 knbeyhing qnlhangan cuko gasoring, gasoring tanming ssnkuwan ka qnlangan tu10 tnbkuwan (qnlhangan Nigeria u mniq kngkawas 1971 tumal gasoring pquri nganguc pssliyan qnlhangan). Qqpahan gasoring mniq kcka keyjay Nigeria pa wada mpusu balay, kiya ka knkan GDP na 40% mi nngalan pila seyhu na 80%. Kiya mi, mniq Niger Turu Hungun Co (pusu balay pnyahan gasoring) meysa qqlahang mlu uuda cuweyn gasoring, wada dndulan uri ka pnyahan niya gasoring, saya u shtur dha smquri cuko kana ka pntahan ngasoring uri. Nigeria tongsyun sucang ka knkana qnlangan ini biyaw mrana na sucang uri, pusu balay burah sucang tyeynsin yunyingsang (mray MTN, Etisalat, Zain mi Globacom) u to bay mniq knbeyhing mi nniqan balay stkuwan kcka qnlhangan dha pkrana qqpahun dha. So niyi uri ka seyhu u prading pkrana weysing tongsyun huwu uri. Nigeria pa niqan Yuco weysing, snpeyyah congpu Abuja Nigeria Qnlhangan Kongcyeyn Keyngkyo mi Pkrana Cyu qmlahang uuda niya. Saya pa Amirika, France, Ingkoku uri qnlhangan ka pusu balay gasoring dangi mawyi dha. Kngkawas 2006 idas 1 diyax 9, Cyokoku Telu kyojyo conghay abura spuda 22.68 oku pila Amirika mari Nigeria 130 go patas pnsdhuwan smruwa kmari gasoring ucilung (OML130) NA 45% na biyax qnblayaq qqpahun, Cyokoku ka wada mtaxa pusu balay gasoring dangi mawyi uri da. Nigeria pa wada pqriyun tnbarah sucang, kiya mi wisu ini biyaw msdalih tukcka nngalan qnlhangan dha, qnlhangan Nigeria u niqan mttuku balay cuweyn, kiya mi pkrana malu na cinjong, horicu, tongsyun mi qqpahan ppnan uri, niqan tu2 knbeyhing cngcweyn cyawyiso Afrika (Nigeria Cngcweyn Cyawyiso) uri. Spuda biyax bbari dha smpu, kngkawas 2007 Nigeria na GDP mniq qnlangan na tu37 tnbkuwan. Nigeria ka Amirika mniq tuhunac Sahara qnlhangan Afrika knbeyhing bay dangi mawyi, pndungus Amirika gasoring mniq knkana qnlhangan na tu5 (11% ka cinko gasoring). Dhiya uri u mniq kcka qnlangan mtuhuy Amirika mawyi na tu7 knbeyhing swenca qnlhangan. Nigeria saya ka Amirika tu50 knbeyhing qqiya pnyahan dha cuko sucang, kiya ka Amirika tu14 knbeyhing cinko qqiya pnyahan na qnlhangan. Amirika ka qnlhangan dha knbeyhing na qnlhangan icil tucu niya. Ou balay uuda keyjay u mssli mniq 4 pusu balay alang mkbrnux: Lagos, Kaduna, Ppanan Asu Harcourt mi Abuja. Kiya ka pusu balay keyjay congsin ka dniyi, pkrana nniqan icil u wisu balay so sqda kiya. Cuxan han pa, pkrana keyjay Nigeria u bsiyaq balay yahan qmlahang heytay seyhu, mqnaqah, ini tdwani qmlahang ka qnriqu niya, kiya u saya ka pnwaya mincu ka pdungus mi bukuy mndungus sbrahan ka uuda keyjay, kiya ka wada psdrxun pdungus ka uuda Nigeria, prading pkrana mbiyax balay biyax keyjay dha, kiya dhuq mpusu balay keyjayti Afrika ka sngtangan dha. Qnlhangan Nigeria pa niqan tubaraw bay knrana na cinjong huwu, niqan tndxral qnlhangan mi qnlhangan nganguc na ginghang, cucan qmlahang kojyo, cngcweyn cingci kojyo, pawsyeyn kojyo mi cingci sediq, sumu kucweyn tocu cicin kiya mi tocu ginghang. Qqpahan pnwalang ka Nigeria pusu balay qqpahan sntuku pila wayhuy cbiyaw. Nigeria cbiyaw pa mnqnlangan knbeyhing bay qnlhangan cuko trabus, koko mi abura qhuni sksik, kiya mi qhuni beyhing sbiki, mmudu hiyi pnwalang, lhngay, yuku, bunga qhuni, sanyaw mi sibus pusu balay pnyahan qnlhangan. Ya bay niqan 60% sediq Nigeria ka qmpah pyahan qqpahan pnwalang, kiya uri u qnlhangan dha pa niqan ou balay malu qpahan dxral mi ini dha dani tmabul nina. Nigeria u niqan ou balay ini dayi ptrawah kmari ka kwangwu cuweyn, kiya ka knkana gasu ida nkiya, mey, dxral hwan, tan xxihuy kwang, king, btunux xiluy kwang, btunux seykay, si, ni, btunux mo mi sin. Ana so niqan knou bay snkuwan niya ka ida nkiya cuweyn niyi, binaw quri so qqpahun kmari kongyey qnlhangan Nigeria pa ida wisu mniq so npnrdingan niya na. Qqpahan mpsalu Nigeria pa kiya ka knkana mpsalu qraqil mi qqpahan tminun (wa mssli mniq Kano, Abeokuta, Onitsha mi Lagos), mpsalu rulu (mray so rulu France u smalu maku mi traku Ingkoku mpsalu niya Bedford, saya ka tongyong rulu na kingal cida kojyo), lukus Tisyo, gomu smluwan mi qqpahan cyakong uuqun. So cduray hari ka qnlhangan Nigeria niyi pa nngalan hbangan kcka qnlhangan u wada mrana balay, kiya ka wada briyan tndxral qnlhangan Nigeria mi kwoci ka eyga (nawraywu) Nigeria, kiya mi mniq Afrika qnlhangan icil mi duma nniqan O Co u kuxul dha balay uri. Jen-ko Knhbrawan hiyi sediq Nigeria saya pa wada hmrinas 2 oku 500 knbkiyan hiyi sediq, mnniq tuhunac ka Kuriscyang mi tudaya na Muslim pa mndungus balay 1:1, qridin tnquli laqi ryu pdkana u 5.5 laqi, knou balay ka 8.6 laqi. Spuda so qnita smpu, ya bay so dhuq kngkawas 2050 daw, Nigeria ka muda rmirih Amirika, mtu3 knou balay knhbrawan hiyi sediq qnlhangan, mphrinas 3 oku ka mnniq hiya. Dhuq kngkawas 2100 daw, knhbrawan hiyi sediq Nigeria u mpdhuq 8 oku, mknkana qnlangan knhbrawan balay sediq 3 qnlhangan uri. Kiya mi knkana knhbrawan hiyi sediq Afrika dhuq kngkawas 20100 daw musa smpusal mrana, mpdhuq 42 oku hiyi sediq. Cung-cyaw Qnlhangan sediq Nigeria pusu balay ka tuhunac snluhay snhiyan Kiristo kyo mi tudaya ka snluhay snhiyan Muslim kyo, Kiristo kyo ka knkana sediq na 44.21%, Islam kyo ka knkana sediq na 52.61%, snluhay pnsltudan pa ya bay 3%, tudaya duma nniqan pa wada dmuwi pnwaya Islam kyo. Ilorin. 伊洛林(Ilorin) Cing-ci Mttoko balay ka gasoring mi ida nkiya gaso coweyn Nigeria. Kndadax kngkawas 1970 dhoq saya pa, gasoring coko ka kndodol wada poso balay pnyahan keyjay qnlhangan dha. Gasoring coko ka knkana nngalan dha 98%, kiya ka knkana nngalan qnlhangan na 83%. Mniq kngkawas 2006, bnkowan patas sngcan congco kcka qnlhangan Nigeria (kwoci hoyryo) dhoq 238,920, to2 tnbkowan kana Afrika, msnol bokoy Tohonac Afrika (408,074). Spoda Ingkoko Keyjay Sweyjn Coko mi Qnlangan Ginghang ka smpo, GDP Nigeria pa spoda biyax bbari dha smpo o kndadax kngkawas 2005 na 1707 oko pila Amirika dhoq kngkawas 2007 na 2926 oko pila Amirika, wada balay hmrinas mn1 dongan. Kiya mi kngkawas 2014 Nigeria Qnlhangan Pyawcwencyo tongci sweycya Jemikale ka pkla, keyjay tnkawas Nigeria pa wada dhoq 5090 oko pila Amirika da, keyjay knoo niya o wada hmrinas Tohonac Afrika mi wada mtbkowan qnlangan to26, wada mknbeyhing bay keyjayti Afrika. Binaw mniq qori so lxanan smlowan mi sskowan nengweyn o, ini baka Tohonac Afrika kiya. Mniq 20 th 70 kngkkawas jiday mrana balay ka gasoring cida, Nigeria o alaw lxanan smlowan toco mi psomo pila kiya ka wada oo balay ka saking dha ngangoc. Mniq 80 jiday kcka qnrqilan gasoring o, wada mlih ka knkrayan gasoring, Nigeria o msmay bay moway saking dha ngangoc, binaw hiti daw wada scoqi pririh moway pila saking, kiya ka wada psanak moway doma taykang risi ori. Pnsaking pila mi baking risi ka wada mrana mi ini dhqi moway ka poso pila saking, kndodol mrana balay ka saking dha. Binaw, spoda seyho Nigeria mi pnsaking qnlhangan ka moda pprngaw kari daw, kngkawas 2005 idas 10 Nigeria mi Paris Cyoropo pnsaking pila o wada mddahor psdho kari, Nigeria o ya bay dmowi 60% nhlitan pila snborah mari saking dha dongan. Kiya mi dmowi nangalan ndhiya nanaq pila gasoring moda moway msngari niya 40%, tnkawas mangal hmrinas 11.5 oko pila Amirika ddiyon qori phlih mqrinoc niya. Nigeria mniq kngkawas 2006 idas 4 pa wada smnlanan rikisi: Dhiya o wada mto1 pririh kana Paris Cyoropo taykang na qnlhangan Afrika (ya bay niqan 300 oko pila Amirika). Nigeria ka knkana qnlangan to12 knbeyhing pnyahan gasoring mi to8 knbeyhing qnlhangan coko gasoring, gasoring tanming ssnkowan ka qnlangan to10 tnbkowan (qnlhangan Nigeria o mniq kngkawas 1971 tomal gasoring pqori ngangoc pssliyan qnlhangan). Qqpahan gasoring mniq kcka keyjay Nigeria pa wada mposo balay, kiya ka knkan GDP na 40% mi nngalan pila seyho na 80%. Kiya mi, mniq Niger Toro Hongon Co (poso balay pnyahan gasoring) meysa qqlahang mlo ooda coweyn gasoring, wada dndolan ori ka pnyahan niya gasoring, saya o shtor dha smqori coko kana ka pntahan ngasoring ori. Nigeria tongsyon socang ka knkana qnlangan ini biyaw mrana na socang ori, poso balay borah socang tyeynsin yonyingsang (mray MTN, Etisalat, Zain mi Globacom) o to bay mniq knbeyhing mi nniqan balay stkowan kcka qnlhangan dha pkrana qqpahon dha. So niyi ori ka seyho o prading pkrana weysing tongsyon howo ori. Nigeria pa niqan Yoco weysing, snpeyyah congpo Aboja Nigeria Qnlhangan Kongcyeyn Keyngkyo mi Pkrana Cyo qmlahang ooda niya. Saya pa Amirika, France, Ingkoko ori qnlhangan ka poso balay gasoring dangi mawyi dha. Kngkawas 2006 idas 1 diyax 9, Cyokoko Telo kyojyo conghay abora spoda 22.68 oko pila Amirika mari Nigeria 130 go patas pnsdhowan smrowa kmari gasoring ocilong (OML130) NA 45% na biyax qnblayaq qqpahon, Cyokoko ka wada mtaxa poso balay gasoring dangi mawyi ori da. Nigeria pa wada pqriyon tnbarah socang, kiya mi wiso ini biyaw msdalih tokcka nngalan qnlhangan dha, qnlhangan Nigeria o niqan mttoko balay coweyn, kiya mi pkrana malo na cinjong, horico, tongsyon mi qqpahan ppnan ori, niqan to2 knbeyhing cngcweyn cyawyiso Afrika (Nigeria Cngcweyn Cyawyiso) ori. Spoda biyax bbari dha smpo, kngkawas 2007 Nigeria na GDP mniq qnlangan na to37 tnbkowan. Nigeria ka Amirika mniq tohonac Sahara qnlhangan Afrika knbeyhing bay dangi mawyi, pndongos Amirika gasoring mniq knkana qnlhangan na to5 (11% ka cinko gasoring). Dhiya ori o mniq kcka qnlangan mtohoy Amirika mawyi na to7 knbeyhing swenca qnlhangan. Nigeria saya ka Amirika to50 knbeyhing qqiya pnyahan dha coko socang, kiya ka Amirika to14 knbeyhing cinko qqiya pnyahan na qnlhangan. Amirika ka qnlhangan dha knbeyhing na qnlhangan icil toco niya. Oo balay ooda keyjay o mssli mniq 4 poso balay alang mkbrnox: Lagos, Kadona, Ppanan Aso Harcoort mi Aboja. Kiya ka poso balay keyjay congsin ka dniyi, pkrana nniqan icil o wiso balay so sqda kiya. Coxan han pa, pkrana keyjay Nigeria o bsiyaq balay yahan qmlahang heytay seyho, mqnaqah, ini tdwani qmlahang ka qnriqo niya, kiya o saya ka pnwaya minco ka pdongos mi bokoy mndongos sbrahan ka ooda keyjay, kiya ka wada psdrxon pdongos ka ooda Nigeria, prading pkrana mbiyax balay biyax keyjay dha, kiya dhoq mposo balay keyjayti Afrika ka sngtangan dha. Qnlhangan Nigeria pa niqan tobaraw bay knrana na cinjong howo, niqan tndxral qnlhangan mi qnlhangan ngangoc na ginghang, cocan qmlahang kojyo, cngcweyn cingci kojyo, pawsyeyn kojyo mi cingci sediq, somo kocweyn toco cicin kiya mi toco ginghang. Qqpahan pnwalang ka Nigeria poso balay qqpahan sntoko pila wayhoy cbiyaw. Nigeria cbiyaw pa mnqnlangan knbeyhing bay qnlhangan coko trabos, koko mi abora qhoni sksik, kiya mi qhoni beyhing sbiki, mmodo hiyi pnwalang, lhngay, yoko, bonga qhoni, sanyaw mi sibos poso balay pnyahan qnlhangan. Ya bay niqan 60% sediq Nigeria ka qmpah pyahan qqpahan pnwalang, kiya ori o qnlhangan dha pa niqan oo balay malo qpahan dxral mi ini dha dani tmabol nina. Nigeria o niqan oo balay ini dayi ptrawah kmari ka kwangwo coweyn, kiya ka knkana gaso ida nkiya, mey, dxral hwan, tan xxihoy kwang, king, btonox xiloy kwang, btonox seykay, si, ni, btonox mo mi sin. Ana so niqan knoo bay snkowan niya ka ida nkiya coweyn niyi, binaw qori so qqpahon kmari kongyey qnlhangan Nigeria pa ida wiso mniq so npnrdingan niya na. Qqpahan mpsalo Nigeria pa kiya ka knkana mpsalo qraqil mi qqpahan tminon (wa mssli mniq Kano, Abeokota, Onitsha mi Lagos), mpsalo rolo (mray so rolo France o smalo mako mi trako Ingkoko mpsalo niya Bedford, saya ka tongyong rolo na kingal cida kojyo), lokos Tisyo, gomo smlowan mi qqpahan cyakong ooqon. So cdoray hari ka qnlhangan Nigeria niyi pa nngalan hbangan kcka qnlhangan o wada mrana balay, kiya ka wada briyan tndxral qnlhangan Nigeria mi kwoci ka eyga (nawraywo) Nigeria, kiya mi mniq Afrika qnlhangan icil mi doma nniqan O Co o koxol dha balay ori. Jen-ko Knhbrawan hiyi sediq Nigeria saya pa wada hmrinas 2 oko 500 knbkiyan hiyi sediq, mnniq tohonac ka Koriscyang mi todaya na Moslim pa mndongos balay 1:1, qridin tnqoli laqi ryo pdkana o 5.5 laqi, knoo balay ka 8.6 laqi. Spoda so qnita smpo, ya bay so dhoq kngkawas 2050 daw, Nigeria ka moda rmirih Amirika, mto3 knoo balay knhbrawan hiyi sediq qnlhangan, mphrinas 3 oko ka mnniq hiya. Dhoq kngkawas 2100 daw, knhbrawan hiyi sediq Nigeria o mpdhoq 8 oko, mknkana qnlangan knhbrawan balay sediq 3 qnlhangan ori. Kiya mi knkana knhbrawan hiyi sediq Afrika dhoq kngkawas 20100 daw mosa smposal mrana, mpdhoq 42 oko hiyi sediq.
